title: Hextech Keys no longer being dropped
body:
Has anyone had any trouble getting hextech keys?
i obtained 4 key FRAGMENTS in the first 2 days of this event, but since then have not received any at all, even-though ive won over 2 dozen games since.

replies.body: My mama says that alligators are ornery cuz they got all them chests, but no key fragments...
Riot has stated that every time you earn a key fragment, the drop rate for your next key fragment decreases. The drop rate does reset each month, though.
basically boils down to maybe 1 free crappy skin every year or so.  So generous...
Riot's already confirmed that the drop rate is not linear
